name: Ape Chase
description:
GAME STILL IN DEVELOPMENT!!! THERE WILL BE BUGS AND OTHER                                                                                               PROBLEMS!!!!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

IF YOUR PLAYER MODEL DOES NOT SPAWN IN WHEN YOU START THE GAME RESTART THE GAME!!!!!!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

                                                                        Ape Chase - Beta 0.4

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Ape Chase is a multiplayer VR game where there are multiple levels you must complete. The levels are parkour-based and have elements of "Getting Over It" and "Gorilla Tag". There are only three maps so far (home, junkyard, and castle) and only one game mode, but in the coming updates there will be much more! There are 3 cosmetics (2 obtained by beating levels, 1 secret) that can be equipped. In the future I plan on adding a race mode where the person who beats the level first wins, a dodgeball mode where you can play dodgeball, and possibly a tag mode like in "Gorilla Tag". If you find any bugs, have any suggestions, or want to see a feature message me on Discord. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Discord Username: Stunted#1586

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HAVE FUN!
